name: Arcane Kitty
text_description: The Arcane Kitty may seem cute but it is deceptively powerful in attack. However, its defense is very weak. When the Arcane Kitty is in play, it allows the player to draw an extra card.
illustration_description: A small and cute kitten, glowing with purple arcane energy, is playfully batting at a swirling globe of magic. The background is an old, musty library filled with arcane tomes.
